[[inst_lhu]]
==== LHU

*Syntax:* lhu [SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw}><<<shamt>], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Load unsigned 16-bit halfword from memory.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_lhu.svg[LHU encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA/BASE_REG
